function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of understanding of the relationship between RH and AH may lead to misinterpretation of humidity's role in disease transmission.","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of risk factors for disease transmission, leading to ineffective containment measures.","Mitigation":"Education and training on the relationship between RH and AH for public health professionals and researchers.","Technologies":"Educational materials, online courses, and workshops on humidity and disease transmission.","People":"Public health professionals, researchers, policymakers.","Owner":"Educational institutions, public health organizations, government agencies."},{"Description":"Incorrect interpretation of humidity levels may result in ineffective virus survival predictions and seasonality assessments.","Impact":"Misguided public health interventions and resource allocation in response to infectious diseases.","Mitigation":"Development of standardized guidelines and protocols for interpreting humidity data in the context of disease transmission.","Technologies":"Data analytics tools, modeling software, and standardized data reporting formats.","People":"Epidemiologists, public health officials, researchers.","Owner":"Public health organizations, research institutions, government agencies."},{"Description":"Misunderstanding the impact of temperature on the relationship between AH and RH can lead to misinterpretation of environmental risk factors for disease transmission.","Impact":"Failure to account for temperature effects on humidity-related disease transmission, leading to incomplete risk assessments and control measures.","Mitigation":"Integration of temperature and humidity data analysis in disease transmission models and risk assessments.","Technologies":"Integrated data analysis software, environmental monitoring systems, and climate modeling tools.","People":"Epidemiologists, climate scientists, public health officials.","Owner":"Research institutions, environmental agencies, public health organizations."}]}
